description:
HD Bible was designed from the ground up for use on the TouchPad. HD Bible's easy navigation allows you to quickly find the passage you are looking for. Click a verse and add a quick mark so you can return to that verse quickly & easily. Works well for preachers that like to bounce around the bible and now you can follow along with ease.

This is the initial release of HD Bible.

Features Include:
 -Quick Navigation
 -Multi-panes for maximum viewing area
 -Translation selector

Many more features are planned including:
 -Notes
 -Searches
 -Side by side translations
 -Additional Translations

Please support this project's development by downloading.
